attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, the pensioners, have been informed that the pension will come inline with inflation in 2012.  We would like this to happen now! There are millions of pensioners in the UK who will have to make the decision this year on whether to 'heat or eat'. 
Many pensioners are living below the poverty line, surely this should not be the case in the 21st Century, when we are one of the riches countries in Europe?
We want to be able to live out our lives in dignity and with respect. Is this too much to ask considering just how much this 'forgotten generation' have put into this country?
The Pension increases will not even cover the cost of main ingredients like milk and bread, so how are we expected to pay for a staple diet on a fixed income?
Please do something now, in the hopes of saving many lives come the winter.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
